remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設為`true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`具有`disposing`設定為`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 當`disposing`參數為 true 時，這個方法由任何 managed 物件持有的資源全部釋出這個參考。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

para.span: 當覆寫小心不要參考先前處置好的呼叫中的物件。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需有關事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`ToolStripDropDown1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolStripDropDown1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在處理對話方塊按鍵，例如索引標籤、 RETURN、 逸出和方向鍵前置處理的訊息，會呼叫這個方法。This method is called during message preprocessing to handle dialog box keys, such as TAB, RETURN, ESCAPE, and arrow keys. 只有當呼叫這個方法方法會指示控制項未處理的索引鍵。This method is called only if the method indicates that the control is not processing the key. 只是傳送至父代的字元方法，則傳回`false`如果控制項沒有父代。The simply sends the character to the parent's method, or returns `false` if the control has no parent. 類別會覆寫此方法以執行實際處理對話方塊按鍵。The class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog box keys. 當控制項裝載在 Windows Forms 應用程式，或為 ActiveX 控制項時，只會呼叫這個方法。This method is only called when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or as an ActiveX control.

protected public: override bool ProcessMnemonic(char charCode);

span.span: The character to process.

summary.span: 處理助憶鍵字元。

span.span: Processes a mnemonic character.

returns.span: 如果控制項已將字元當成助憶鍵處理，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the character was processed as a mnemonic by the control; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 讓控制項可以處理助憶鍵字元，會呼叫這個方法。This method is called to give a control the opportunity to process a mnemonic character. 方法應該判斷控制項是否處於處理助憶鍵的狀態，而且是否指定的字元是否代表助憶鍵。The method should determine whether the control is in a state to process mnemonics and if whether the given character represents a mnemonic. 如果因此，此方法應該執行的助憶鍵和傳回相關聯的動作`true`。If so, the method should perform the action associated with the mnemonic and return `true`. 如果不是，這個方法應傳回`false`。If not, the method should return `false`. 實作這個方法通常會使用方法，以判斷指定的字元是否符合助憶鍵在控制項的文字。Implementations of this method often use the method to determine whether the given character matches a mnemonic in the control's text. 例如：For example: ```csharp if (CanSelect && IsMnemonic(charCode, MyControl.Text) { // Perform action associated with mnemonic. } ``` 預設實作方法只會傳回`false`指出控制項是否有任何的助憶鍵。This default implementation of the method simply returns `false` to indicate that the control has no mnemonic. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫 按鈕類別的延伸出現自訂行為的方法。The following code example demonstrates an extension of the button class that overrides the method to exhibit custom behavior. 此範例也示範如何使用和屬性。The example also demonstrates the use of the and properties. 若要執行此範例中，貼上下列程式碼的表單類別之後，在相同的檔案。To run this example, paste the following code after a form class, in the same file. 新增類型的按鈕`MnemonicButton`至表單。Add a button of type `MnemonicButton` to the form. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic/VB/form1.vb#1)]
